name: Gifter's Basics in Snowboarding and Stick Figures
name_original: Gifter's Basics in Snowboarding and Stick Figures
description:
Welcome to the snowboarding academy!

Gifter's Basics introduces you to none other than the famous stick man Gifter himself. He's a pro snowboarder, so you should be able to learn a trick or two from him. Along the way, you'll meet a bunch of poorly designed characters who happen to look like stick figures. 

Your goal of the game is to collect 7 sets of boots, since Gifter's out of stock when you enter the academy. Along the way, Gifter may also want to play a round of "tag" with you. So grab a board and have a great time!

Because this academy is absolutely fun.

CURRENT STATE OF MOD

This page contains the PRE-RELEASE version of the mod. That means I haven't added or tweaked everything yet. Any existing changes or additions are, of course, subject to change. The official mod should take up to a month to complete.

Exclusive pre-release package!

If you get a pre-release version of the game, the folder will include an exclusive 3D character called "Creepy Mick" that I did! The sprite isn't within any of my mods, and he also won't be in the final build's folder for the game.

ENJOY THE MOD!
